title: Celestial Surfer Riding the Emerald Dragon Wave
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, stunning watercolor illustration, Donghua Chinese animation style, Wuxia fantasy art, A heroic figure dressed in flowing traditional turquoise robes (Hanfu) surfing gracefully on the crest of a massive, stylized emerald green wave. The wave is dynamic with frothing white foam. In the background, a brilliant, oversized red sun sets dramatically above a horizon line dotted with traditional Chinese architecture (pavilions and pagodas) and misty mountains. Several elegant red-crowned cranes soar through the vibrant, fiery sky filled with purple, orange, and crimson clouds. Dynamic lighting, ethereal atmosphere, traditional Chinese ink wash elements. 9:16 aspect ratio.
